name: cartoons-by-john-api
description: Backend API for the Cartoons! By John app
author: Josh Lapham <josh@joshlapham.com>

scripts.cover: $(npm bin)/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
